{"language":"python","parent":["import sqlite3

dbname = 'TEST.db'
conn = sqlite3.connect(dbname)
cur = conn.cursor()

","# personテーブルデータを全件取得
cur.execute('SELECT * FROM person')
data = cur.fetchall()
print(data)","

conn.commit()

cur.close()
conn.close()"],"caption":[]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"このコードを実行してください。\n以下のように出力されればデータの取得に成功です。","href":null}]}
{"language":"bash","parent":["[(1, 'Sato', 15, 'Man')]"],"caption":[]}

{"icon":{"type":"external","external":{"url":"https://www.notion.so/icons/code_gray.svg"}},"color":"default_background","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"personテーブルから、任意のidの行のデータを取得する","href":null}]}

{"language":"python","parent":["import sqlite3

dbname = 'TEST.db'
conn = sqlite3.connect(dbname)
cur = conn.cursor()

","# 任意の値を入れる
target_id = 1

# personテーブルから任意の行のデータを取得
cur.execute('SELECT * FROM person WHERE id = ?',(target_id,))
data = cur.fetchall()

","# 取得したデータを出力
print(data)

conn.commit()

cur.close()
conn.close()"],"caption":[]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"このコードだと、","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":true,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"target_id","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"の値によって、テーブルから取得するデータの行が変わります。","href":null}]}
